API Class¶

class api.api.ChessAPI(db_url='init')¶

Requests received from the flask server will be sent to ChessAPI and ChessAPI will call appropriate functions in ChessGame as well as maintain different game sessions.

create_game(username: str, mode: str) → dict¶

Create a new chess game in put it in the dictionary, store the data in the database. :param username: :param mode: :return: A dict where only has one key “session_id”

generate_unique_session_id() → int¶

Generate unique session id. :return: A unique session id

get_checked_moves(request: dict, username: str) → dict¶

Get all valid moves which won’t let you be checked in certain game for a coordinate. :param request: A dict including session id and piece coordinate :param username: logged in user :return: A dict which including all valid moves which won’t let you be checked in certain game for a coordinate.

get_info(request: dict, username: str) → dict¶

Get the game info of a certain game. :param request: A dict with one key “session_id” :param username: logged in user :return: A dict with key “fen”, “status”, “history”, “turn” and “mode” and corresponding values

get_user_info(username: str) → dict¶

Get information associated with the logged in user :param username: :return: A dict with key “username”, “total_hours”, “valid” and corresponding values

login(request: dict) → dict¶

For user to login their account :param request: A dict with key “username” and “password” of a registered user :return: A dict with key “valid” indicates whether successfully log the user in

replay(username: str, session_id: int, step: int) → dict¶

Get information of certain game after certain step :param username: :param session_id: :param step: :return: A dict with key “fen”, “history” and “valid” with corresponding values

replay_game(username: str) → dict¶

Get all sessions that could be replayed :param username: :return: A dict which has key “replay_list” and value as a list of dict storing session id, start time, last update and mode

resume_game(username: str) → dict¶

Get all on-going unfinished sessions and their start time and last update time. :param username: :return: A dict which has key “resume_list” and value as a list of dict storing session id, start time, last update and mode

sign_up(request: dict) → dict¶

Sign a user up :param request: A dict with key “username” and “password” :return: A dict with key “valid” indicates whether successfully sign the user up

undo(username: str, session_id: int) → dict¶

Undo one step in the game, will delete history in both game() and database table :param username: :param session_id: :return: A dict with information of the game after undo

update_current(session_id: int) → None¶

Helper function which will update game table. :param session_id: Game session id which needs to update :return: None

update_game(request: dict, username: str) → dict¶

Update a certain game from source to target, and promotion role if occurred. :param request: A dict including session id, source coordinate, target coordinate, and promotion role. :param username: logged in user :return: A dict including info about update validation, whether being checked, game status and turn color.

update_history(session_id: int) → None¶

Helper function which will update history table. :param session_id: Game session id which needs to update :return: None
